name: Rune NFT #370
description: A Rune sacred to Heimdall, the underworld watcher. Right Side: A rune of renewed light after a period of darkness or confusion. It is also a warning of a danger to health, possibly in the form of fever, abscesses, ulcers, physical or mental problems. As a torch this rune also represents creative fire and artistic impulse. it is a shining beacon of hope in the dark. Reversed: This rune reversed is indicative of a block on creativity.
